Html: Is it possible to increase the maximum limit of the fight duration? At the moment it doesn't go higher than 20 minutes. Was trying to set it to 25 to simulate the Illidan enrage and it's just not possible.
Sure thing... Which model was this? Holy Priest? Holy Pally?
Sorry about that, pretty sure it was in both the pally and priest ones. Yep, just double checked and they both top out at 20 minutes.
